name: Cristian Castro
description:
'''Cristian Sáinz Castro''' (born 8 December 1974) is a Mexican [[Pop music|pop]] singer. He is the son of actors [[Verónica Castro]] and [[Manuel Valdés|Manuel "El Loco" Valdés]], and nephew of actors [[Ramón Valdés]] (known for playing Don Ramón in ''[[El Chavo del Ocho]]'') and Germán "Tin-Tan" Valdés. Castro has sold over 12 million records, making him one of the [[List of best-selling Latin music artists|best-selling Latin music artists of all-time]].

[[Juan Gabriel]] described Castro as "the man with the most faculties to sing in Mexico".
